_thread_replies.text:
<@U044SKGT4R5> thanks for checking!

The thing is  `gw/auth/passwords/recover` is down for the entire staging. Modal was implemented separately and within this PR we can verify that call is being made.

To mark account as high-risk you can use (don't forget to substitute credentials to yours)

```curl --location '<https://customer-identity-proxy-service.staging-k8s.hellofresh.io/v1/login?country=MR>' \
--header 'exposed-credential-check: 3' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--data-raw '{
    "username": "<mailto:polina.shnaider+mail-test@hellofresh.com|polina.shnaider+mail-test@hellofresh.com>",
    "password": "test123"
}
'```
In order to receive actual email your account must have suffix `mail-test`

_thread_replies.text:
I cannot reproduce the issue on live. Tried on web (using mobile view) and on my phone (iOS).
What I found out is <https://app.sprig.com/feedback/310230/responses?replay=8bbd18e7-ac0a-438c-8f1b-c0136444e68a|another customer> that couldn‚Äôt check the ‚Äúreceive offers‚Äù checkbox on the Delivery page. This is an optional checkbox so they could still move forward.

All the customers have Android 10 (launched in 2019) and very small screens (around 358px) so I‚Äôm thinking if it could be a compatibility issue. Also we tried (even with Max) to find traces of these customers on honeycomb but there‚Äôs nothing :magic:
This could be some incompatibility issue or they have ad block.

I would say it‚Äôs better to monitor the conversion rate drop and keep an eye on the comments to get more insights into the model and version of the phone.
